text: The voting procedures in this subchapter apply to:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 3 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 1-1061.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A general, special, or primary election for President, Vice President, or District of Columbia Delegate to the United States House of Representatives;
A general, special, or primary election for Mayor, Chairman of the Council, member of the Council, member of the State Board of Education, or Attorney General for the District of Columbia;
An initiative, referendum, or recall measure; and

subchapter.text: Accommodations for Military and Overseas Voters.
